code: export var removeSymbol=function removeSymbol(str,symbol){return str&&str.replace(new RegExp(symbol,'g'),'');};export var capitalize=function capitalize(str){return str.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+str.slice(1);};

sourcesContent:
export const removeSymbol = (str, symbol) => str && str.replace(new RegExp(symbol, 'g'), '');

export const capitalize = str => str.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + str.slice(1);
